name: Keen Explore Low Waterproof Light Trail Shoes - Women's
categories: Explore Low Waterproof Light Trail Shoes
description: Explore new areas in all-day comfort. This shoe is burly enough for the trails and still looks good in the city. A waterproof upper and aggressive sole can take on muddy trails and loose terrain. A stability shank provides torsional rigidity and support on uneven ground.Lightweight mesh upper with printed overlays for durability.Keen.Dry waterproof-breathable membrane provides weather protection.Breathable mesh lining has a Cleansport NXT™ antimicrobial treatment to keeps feet fresh.Contoured heel lock adds stability.Removable, anatomic dual-density PU footbed provides arch support and comfort.EVA midsole for a cushioned ride and a stability shank adds lightweight support.KEEN.All-Terrain rubber outsole with 4mm multi-directional lugs provides reliable traction and grip.
